name: Santa's Boxing Bash
description:
'Twas the night before Christmas, when through Santa's ear

He heard an elf yelling, "They're broken! The gears!"

The sorter stopped sorting, and with it the fun

But Santa just knew what needed to be done.

As quick as a flash, he stood by the conveyor

He readied his knuckles like an angry surveyor.

"You'll not ruin Christmas," his eyes twinkled bright.

"I'll do it myself if takes the whole night!"

Play as Santa in this simple mobile game where you punch the presents into the proper sorting boxes. Don't put them in the wrong box or else they won't get delivered! The longer it goes, the faster the presents get. See how far you can go!
